column1: The '''Stiffbeards''' were one of the seven houses of the [[Dwarves]] that dwelt in Mountains of the [[East]].  They were originally paired with the [[Ironfists]].<ref>{{PM

column1: It is possible that the Stiffbeards were among the "''Houses of other Fathers''" who sent troops to help [[Durin's Folk]] in the [[War of the Dwarves and Orcs]].<ref>{{App
